topics.Breakfast: Breakfast was set out to help yourself there were plenty of choices on offer, from cereal to a fry up on offer or yoghurt if preferred that!!
topics.Property: Our room was on the third floor, on approach to our room it seemed quite dark in the corridor not very well lit up!!
topics.Nightlife: The room itself was spacious  inside, spotless clean, a very large shower room/bathroom with fresh towels etc.. Also a television which dud not seem to have English channels but we did find some music on it to listen to.
